title: Change the Grouping
text: We can notice that the last $$2$$ terms have a common denominator, so change the grouping to $$\frac{5}{13}+\frac{3}{4}+\frac{1}{4}$$.
speech: We can notice that the last  2  terms have a common denominator, so change the grouping to  5 over 13 plus 3 fourths plus 1 fourth .
pacedSpeech: We can notice that the last   2
terms have a common denominator, so change the grouping to   5 over 13 plus 3 fourths plus 1 fourth
